mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Upton Herbert to Ann Pamela Cunningham, 1859 October 20
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Herbert, Upton
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Upton Herbert, superintendent, to Ann Pamela Cunningham, October 20, 1859. Typescript transcription included. Mount Vernon. Visitors to MV and dates - Fire companies of Philadelphia and Washington on boats "America" and "Franklin," also Association of printers. Engineer has located 2 roads with easy grades. Buying pickets for fence. J.A. Washington says there is not enough water to cover 5 acres for a lake. Asks for another copy of plan of wall and fence.
